Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 22nd overall pick, by New York (A) in 1971...
Released by New York (A) on 4/1/1971...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 4/1/1971 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 10/1/1975, off Bert Blyleven (STL)...
Won World Series with Chicago (N) in 1975...
Injured on 4/24/1979 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/14/1979 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 5/31/1981, off Cardell Camper (HOU)...
